resources.string: Help us identify issues and improve Tark Matrix by sharing anonymous usage data. To understand how people use multiple devices, we’ll generate a random identifier, shared by your devices.\n\nYou can read all our terms %s.
Help improve Tark Matrix
Tark Matrix Web\nTark Matrix Desktop
Tark Matrix iOS\nTark Matrix Android
Tark Matrix Call Failed
Waiting for users to join Tark Matrix
Once invited users have joined Tark Matrix, you will be able to chat and the room will be end-to-end encrypted
Please launch Tark Matrix on another device that can decrypt the message so it can send the keys to this session.
Tark Matrix is also great for the workplace. It’s trusted by the world’s most secure organisations.
Welcome to Tark Matrix,\n%s.
For your privacy, Tark Matrix only supports sending hashed user email addresses and phone numbers.
This identity server is outdated. Tark Matrix support only API V2.

Tark Matrix needs to perform a clear cache to be up to date, for the following reason:
%s

Note that this action will restart the app and it may take some time.
🔐️ Join me on Tark Matrix
Hey, talk to me on Tark Matrix: %s
Please delete the passphrase if you want Tark Matrix to generate a recovery key.
Tark Matrix policy
%s in Settings to receive invites directly in Tark Matrix.
Tark Matrix Live Location
Tark Matrix could not access your location. Please try again later.
Tark Matrix could not access your location
Tark Matrix Android
Not implemented yet in Tark Matrix
To simplify your Tark Matrix, tabs are now optional. Manage them using the top-right menu.
Tark Matrix needs permission to access your camera and your microphone to perform video calls.\n\nPlease allow access on the next pop-ups to be able to make the call.
Tark Matrix needs permission to display notifications. Notifications can display your messages, your invitations, etc.\n\nPlease allow access on the next pop-ups to be able to view notification.
Tark Matrix needs permission to access your microphone to perform audio calls.
Get help with using Tark Matrix
Tark Matrix requires you to enter your credentials to perform this action.
Tark Matrix encountered an issue when rendering content of event with id \'%1$s\'
Tark Matrix does not handle events of type \'%1$s\'
Tark Matrix Screen Sharing
Tark Matrix will sync in background in way that preserves the device’s limited resources (battery).\nDepending on your device resource state, the sync may be deferred by the operating system.

Tark Matrix will sync in background periodically at precise time (configurable).\nThis will impact radio and battery usage, there will be a permanent notification displayed stating that Tark Matrix is listening for events.
Use default Tark Matrix ringtone for incoming calls
Tark Matrix may crash more often when an unexpected error occurs
Tark Matrix collects anonymous analytics to allow us to improve the application.
PIN code is required every time you open Tark Matrix.
PIN code is required after 2 minutes of not using Tark Matrix.
PIN code is the only way to unlock Tark Matrix.
Tark Matrix is not affected by Battery Optimization.
Background restrictions are enabled for Tark Matrix.\nWork that the app tries to do will be aggressively restricted while it is in the background, and this could affect notifications.\n%1$s
Background restrictions are disabled for Tark Matrix. This test should be run using mobile data (no WIFI).\n%1$s
Notifications are not enabled for this session.\nPlease check the Tark Matrix settings.
[%1$s]\nThis error is out of control of Tark Matrix. There is no Google account on the phone. Please open the account manager and add a Google account.

[%1$s]\nThis error is out of control of Tark Matrix. It can occur for several reasons. Maybe it will work if you retry later, you can also check that Google Play Service is not restricted in data usage in the system settings, or that your device clock is correct, or it can happen on custom ROM.

[%1$s]\nThis error is out of control of Tark Matrix and according to Google, this error indicates that the device has too many apps registered with FCM. The error only occurs in cases where there are extreme numbers of apps, so it should not affect the average user.
Tark Matrix uses Google Play Services to deliver push messages but it doesn’t seem to be configured correctly:\n%1$s
The service will not start when the device is restarted, you will not receive notifications until Tark Matrix has been opened once.
Tark Matrix needs the permission to show notifications.\nPlease grant the permission.
The current session is for user %1$s and you provide credentials for user %2$s. This is not supported by Tark Matrix.\nPlease first clear data, then sign in again on another account.
Use the latest Tark Matrix on your other devices:
Use the latest Tark Matrix on your other devices, Tark Matrix Web, Tark Matrix Desktop, Tark Matrix iOS, Tark Matrix for Android, or another cross-signing capable Matrix client
